Please using this api: StringTokenizer.nextToken.
Answer:<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer("a,b,c", ",");
while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
    System.out.println(st.nextToken());
}
<<<explanation>>>: The nextToken() method of the StringTokenizer class returns the next token from this string tokenizer. This method may be called repeatedly to iterate through the tokens produced by the tokenizer. This is a special case of a reduction. This is a terminal operation.
